Module id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp
Package id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp.util

Class FifteenMatrix

java.lang.Object
id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp.util.Matrix<Integer>
id.ac.itb.stei.informatika.fifteenp.util.FifteenMatrix
public class FifteenMatrix extends Matrix<Integer>
FifteenMatrix is an integer Matrix that has exactly 4 rows and 4 columns and contains only the integers 0-15 each of which only appears exactly once and a single null value which represents the blank tile (cell).

  • Field Summary

    • from

      public static FifteenMatrix from(long id)
      Decodes a long integer into its represented FifteenMatrix object. The decoding is done by splitting 64 bits long integer into 16 4-bits integers and converting each of them to the integers 0-15 with 0 being a blank tile.
      Parameters:
      id - the long integer representation of the matrix to decode
      Returns:
      FifteenMatrix object represented by the long integer
      See Also:
      • identity()

    • identity

      public long identity()
      Encodes this FifteenMatrix object into its long integer representation. The encoding is done by compressing each element into 4 bits of data and concatenating them all into a single 64 bits long integer.
      Returns:
      long integer representation of this FifteenMatrix
      See Also:
      • from(long)
